title: Guardian of Faith
content:
Guardian of Faith is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Guardian of Faith Information

Description: Call forth a divine guardian that attacks nearby enemies. Every time it deals damage, the guardian loses an equal amount of hit points. The guardian is stationary. When an enemy is in range, it uses an attack called "Strike of the Guardian". It has a range of 3m an
